column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I would like to ask if your friend was dining alone
column2: or was she waiting for another guest(s) to arrive? If so
column3: quite often we are unable to seat guests -- even parties of two -- if their party is incomplete. On many occasions
column4: our guests unfortunately have misinformed our hosts that their friends were "just coming around the way" or "just parking their car
column5: only to wait upwards of an hour without receiving service while other parties of two wait for two open seats, a booth, or a table.
